## Checklist

- [ ] Code is formatted (`go fmt ./...`)

- [ ] Code is linted (`golangci-lint run`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`go test ./...`)

- [ ] Changes maintain Unix philosophy (simple, focused, reliable)
